edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.symmetricCrypto.mac

Interface UniqueTagMac

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Mac
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CbcMac, Hmac
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BcHMAC, OpenSSLHMAC, ScCbcMacPrepending

    public interface UniqueTagMac
extends Mac
    Marker interface. Each class that implement this interface is marked as unique tag mac.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
